TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Sinvaudjan, title = Sinvaudjan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sinvaudjan} }

S.FORM: Mudan Mudan gu icuwa i Pingtung. ala atjunangn mapuljat 173.85 km² (ma'linpan atjunang 78.01 km², ma'linaule atjunang 67.38 km²). ala caucau mapuljat 4,619 caucau, ala daceneqlan mapuljat 1,806 a daceneqlan, Puyuma, Amis (93%) a maqcuwa caucau. mudan aicu a mudan(penaywanan: sinvaudjan)i pasakacedas a navalj tua qakaw tua taiwan, nakidekes tua sisigu, daren i taitu, a i tjaikacedas mavan a taipingyan, a i tjaikaledep mavananga a , a i pasanavalj izua a sevangecul, mavan a guciu a tjaljanavalj a gadu a kacalisiyan. azua a "sineljavakan i sinvaudjan "nu 1878 a cavilj a imaza a guciu. nu 1920 a cavilj, aicu a mudan a pinaljavak na sihu nua ripun tua 高雄州恆春郡.qaw, nu paljavak a sihu nua chuguku ta taiwan a imaza, teveljen aza qinaljan imaza, saka masan ta aicu a guciu. aicu a mudan i 恆春半島, a nakitangez ta gadu i cadja, kinamamamawan tua vavavan nua gadu a mavan a nekanga a kuzulj a vavavan a maru tadjekuacan. izuazua a pana a 牡丹,pana a 女仍,pana a 竹社. izuazua a amizuku uta. paljavak tua atjunang matja 6 qinaljan i Mudan. matja 8 qinaljan imaza, Maljipa , Sinevaudjan , Macaran(旭海 部落), Kus kus , Pungudan , Kapanan , Anteng , Draki . likisi aicu a mudan nua sinvaudjan kata kuskus kasicuayan. nu 1874 a cavilj, kiqeci a siha na ripun ta taiwan, masa qineci ta ripun a cawcaw na kacalisiyan nu 1871 a cavilj. aicu a mavan a "sineljavakan i sinvaudjan ". qaw, sinanpazangal taimaza na sihu a 清廷. venaday taimza na sihu nua ripun: tjaqaciljai ,tucu a mudan a . Sinvaudjan ,tucu a mudan a . Kuskus ,tuca a mudan a高士村. Macaren ,tucu a mudan a旭海村. Padriyiur ,tucu a滿州鄉 padriyiur /bunsili ,ljaviyaviya . 四林格,tucu a mudan a四林村四林,虎頭. aicu a unem a qinaljan, pinaljavak tua高雄州恆春郡nu 1920 a cavilj, qaw neka a 街庄.sa pungadan a "恆春下蕃". nu pakavilji a masanmusalj a makaqeci sekacawan, masa a "sineljavakan i sinvaudjan " kata liaw a raculju imaza, sa pungadan a高雄縣牡丹鄉 taimaza. nu 1950 a cavilj, pinaljavak na qakaw. sa venaday a牡丹村 ta 東源村nu 1956 a cavilj. ka 1969 a cavilj, pinaljavak a 八瑤 na滿州鄉長樂村tucu. sepaljavak mavaday a Aicu a guciu tua unem a mula: 石門村:(tjaqaciljai (sinvaudjan 新保將/ (macaren 牡丹灣) 高士村 四林村 tatuluan izua tjelu a gakku a kedrikedri imaza i sinvaudjan(mudan gu). kivangavangan sipacacikelan palidring a djalan palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 26 a palidring a djalan na taiwan palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 199 a palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 199-A a palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 156 a palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 172 a palidring a djalan na qakaw

Modan Modan go icowa i Pingtong. ala atjonangn mapoljat 173.85 km² (ma'linpan atjonang 78.01 km², ma'linaole atjonang 67.38 km²). ala caocao mapoljat 4,619 caocao, ala daceneqlan mapoljat 1,806 a daceneqlan, Poyoma, Amis (93%) a maqcowa caocao. modan aico a modan(penaywanan: sinvaodjan)i pasakacedas a navalj toa qakaw toa taiwan, nakidekes toa sisigo, daren i taito, a i tjaikacedas mavan a taipingyan, a i tjaikaledep mavananga a , a i pasanavalj izoa a sevangecol, mavan a gocio a tjaljanavalj a gado a kacalisiyan. azoa a "sineljavakan i sinvaodjan "no 1878 a cavilj a imaza a gocio. no 1920 a cavilj, aico a modan a pinaljavak na siho noa ripon toa 高雄州恆春郡.qaw, no paljavak a siho noa chogoko ta taiwan a imaza, teveljen aza qinaljan imaza, saka masan ta aico a gocio. aico a modan i 恆春半島, a nakitangez ta gado i cadja, kinamamamawan toa vavavan noa gado a mavan a nekanga a kozolj a vavavan a maro tadjekoacan. izoazoa a pana a 牡丹,pana a 女仍,pana a 竹社. izoazoa a amizoko ota. paljavak toa atjonang matja 6 qinaljan i Modan. matja 8 qinaljan imaza, Maljipa , Sinevaodjan , Macaran(旭海 部落), Kos kos , Pongodan , Kapanan , Anteng , Draki . likisi aico a modan noa sinvaodjan kata koskos kasicoayan. no 1874 a cavilj, kiqeci a siha na ripon ta taiwan, masa qineci ta ripon a cawcaw na kacalisiyan no 1871 a cavilj. aico a mavan a "sineljavakan i sinvaodjan ". qaw, sinanpazangal taimaza na siho a 清廷. venaday taimza na siho noa ripon: tjaqaciljai ,toco a modan a . Sinvaodjan ,toco a modan a . Koskos ,toca a modan a高士村. Macaren ,toco a modan a旭海村. Padriyior ,toco a滿州鄉 padriyior /bonsili ,ljaviyaviya . 四林格,toco a modan a四林村四林,虎頭. aico a onem a qinaljan, pinaljavak toa高雄州恆春郡no 1920 a cavilj, qaw neka a 街庄.sa pongadan a "恆春下蕃". no pakavilji a masanmosalj a makaqeci sekacawan, masa a "sineljavakan i sinvaodjan " kata liaw a racoljo imaza, sa pongadan a高雄縣牡丹鄉 taimaza. no 1950 a cavilj, pinaljavak na qakaw. sa venaday a牡丹村 ta 東源村no 1956 a cavilj. ka 1969 a cavilj, pinaljavak a 八瑤 na滿州鄉長樂村toco. sepaljavak mavaday a Aico a gocio toa onem a mola: 石門村:(tjaqaciljai (sinvaodjan 新保將/ (macaren 牡丹灣) 高士村 四林村 tatoloan izoa tjelo a gakko a kedrikedri imaza i sinvaodjan(modan go). kivangavangan sipacacikelan palidring a djalan palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 26 a palidring a djalan na taiwan palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 199 a palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 199-A a palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 156 a palidring a djalan na qakaw sikamasan 172 a palidring a djalan na qakaw
